      • processAsyncResponse

        public final void processAsyncResponse(RESPONSE_TYPE _response)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: AsyncResponseProcessor
        The processAsyncResponse method accepts the response of a request.

        This method need not be thread-safe, as it is always invoked from the same light-weight thread (targetReactor) that passed the AsyncRequest and AsyncResponseProcessor objects.

        Specified by:
        processAsyncResponse in interface AsyncResponseProcessor<RESPONSE_TYPE>
        Parameters:
        _response - The response to a request.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
